text: John Anderson Jr. (May 8, 1917 - September 15, 2014) was an American politician. He was the 36th Governor of Kansas. He served from 1961 until 1965.John Anderson Jr. biography at politicalgraveyard.com Anderson was born near Olathe, Kansas. Anderson died in Olathe, Kansas at the age of 97.Former Kansas Governor, John Anderson, Jr., dies at 97 at cjonline.com ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1917 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Governors of Kansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Olathe, Kansas Category:Kansas State University alumni
title: John Anderson Jr.
